Sure, I can recommend two action movies from this list:

1. John Wick: This movie follows the story of John Wick, an assassin who goes on a vigilante mission after his beloved dog is killed.

John Wick has become a massive hit with its intense and thrilling storyline, amazing performances by Keanu Reeves and the supporting cast, and great action sequences that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

2. Die Hard: This classic 1988 action movie directed by John McTiernan stars Bruce Willis as John McClane, a New York City police officer who goes on a solo mission to rescue his wife from terrorists who have taken over an office building in L.A. and are holding the hostages captive.

Die Hard is considered one of the greatest action movies ever made, not just for its incredible action sequences, mind-bending plot twists, and iconic scenes like when John McClane chases after a car filled with bad guys and finally catches up to it and jumps inside the car, and also for its amazing performances by Bruce Willis as John McClane, and the supporting cast, including Alan Rickman as Hans Gruber, who is the mastermind behind the entire hostage crisis in L.A., and also including Jeremy Irons as Oliver Queen, who is the charismatic and cunning leader of the superhero team known as "The Justice League", which includes other iconic superhero characters like Superman (Henry Cavill), Wonder Woman (Gal Gadot), The Flash (Benjamin Affleck), Aquaman (Jason Momoa), Martian Maniacs (Michael Jai White), The Tick (Benjamin Druon), and also including some less-known lesser-known superhero characters like The Green Lantern, Green Lantern II: Rise of the Dark Lantern, Green Lantern III: Sinister Separation, Green Lantern IV: The Dark Atom, Green Lantern V: The Sinestro's Weakness, Green Lantern VI: Inescapable Destiny, Green Lantern VII: Forgetting the Past, Green Lantern VIII: Time for Change, Green Lantern IX: The End of an Era, Green Lantern X: A New Beginning.

Based on the user's message, they seem interested in the action genre. Here are some highly rated action movies that you might enjoy:

  1. "John Wick" (2014) - A retired hitman must take down a powerful criminal organization.
  2. "Die Hard" (1988) - Police officer John McClane, aided by a young cop named Bill Mitchell, infiltrates the computer network of a terrorist group to prevent them from launching a nuclear strike on the United States.
  3. "Mad Max: Fury Road" (2015) - In a dystopian future, humanity is driven to the brink of annihilation by an evil empire known as the "Apocalypse Now" project.
  4. "Gladiator" (2000) - Roman general Maximus Decimus, who was once considered one of the greatest gladiators in history, must defeat three powerful enemies in order to save his family from a deadly trap that has been set up by the enemy.
  5. "The Dark Knight" (2008) - Batman, also known as Bruce Wayne, is an avenger who fights against criminal activities and other dangers in Gotham City.
  6. "Inception" (2010) - Professional thief Dom Cobb enters a dream-world to steal corporate secrets from the mind of a powerful business magnate.
  7. "The Avengers" (2012) - A superhero team led by Iron Man,简称“复仇者联盟”（Avengers Initiative）, consisting of several superheroes including Captain America, Thor, Black Widow, and Hawkeye among others, are assembled to battle an evil alien known as Thanos.
  8. "Avengers: Endgame" (2019) - In the aftermath of their victory over Thanos, a group of superheroes known as "The Avengers Initiative" (Avengers Initiative) gather for one last mission before they retire from their superhero duties.
  9. "Iron Man" (2008) - The story follows Tony Stark (also known as Iron Man) as he struggles to balance his powerful business empire with his personal life, including his relationship with his estranged wife Pepper Potts and his daughter Morgan who both play a significant role in the plot.
  10. "Black Panther" (2018) - The story follows T'Challa (also known as Black Panther) as he struggles to balance his powerful African nation of Wakanda with his personal life, including his relationship with his estranged wife Shuri and his daughter Nakia who both play a significant role in the plot.
